name: Insanity Office
description:
Insanity Office

A small FNAF inspired game about staying in an office for as long as you can. The day counter will go up every time a day has passed, will someone save you or are you going to lose your sanity? Go find out, by installing the game!

SPECIAL INFORMATION!

We are currently working on this game so that you can get way more content!

If you have any ideas, feel free to leave them in the comments below! We would love to involve the Community in this.

Controls:

[ESCAPE] to quit

[LEFT-MOUSE] enable/disable flashlight

[MOVE-MOUSE] Look around
